replies.body: Really not liking the tp nerfs...

Just played a game as Tahm Kench.
New passive damage is less than half of what it used to be when full build....

Can I just say that it now scales off MAX health and no longer BONUS health, so 1 or 2 stacks will do less damage but it will do a lot more at three stacks. You know that if your at level 18 with 7000 health three stacks will do more than 6% bonus health would so you are definitely doing something wrong if you are only doing half of what it used to do. Also as a bonus you get this passive pre 6 and have more early damage

It's almost like 1.5%/3%/4.5% is less than 6% 
Congrats on basic maths mate
Still waiting for the announcement of a Fire Emblem emblem...
Is soulstealer vayne out now? or will it be added when nami comes out?
Soulstealer Vayne will be added to Hextech Crafting during this patch. There will be a separate announcement article when it's pushed live so keep an eye out for that one.

Nami's skin is written as "will be"
Vayne's is written as "Has been"

so id say its relatively safe to assume Vayne's is already available.
Weird, I didn't get it from rerolling lol
Yeah, good luck with that...

20 sec for swain??? are you for real ? the guy have slow Q,W,E PLUS terrible basic attack ? and now wait 20 sec to save his ass ?pfff come on riot have better champs to fix! like AZIr range!! have a mad early game, like LB still a champ that can just jump kill easy one champ and run away so easy! 
swain should have one way to defend him self from that 20 sec! also swain is just madness after being badly feed or very late game !!

You know with 40% CDR, the cooldown is only 12 seconds right? I think that's still broken considering it can give you sustain in lane for dirt a cheap cost (~60 mana in patch 6.13 for 2 seconds). If you have to constantly use R to "save his ass", then I can assure you that you are playing him very wrong considering he has a slow and a root. His R isn't an anti-disengage tool, but rather a "IT'S TIME TO D-D-D-D-D-DUEL!" ability.
Bronzie laying down the heat
